content:
## Operations

* Member
    * Get a membership
    * Get all memberships in a space
* Message
    * Create a message
    * Delete a message
    * Get a message
	* Send and Wait for Response
    * Update a message
* Space
    * Get a space
    * Get all spaces the caller is a member of
